resources.string: Make your first transaction to get started!
You’re offline. Check your connection and pull to refresh.
The request took too long. Please pull to refresh or try again later.
Our servers are having trouble. Please pull to refresh or try again later.
We couldn’t process the request. Please pull to refresh or try again later.
We received unexpected data. Please pull to refresh or try again later.
Something went wrong. Please pull to refresh or try again later.
